argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mendvscafval.a | |- A = ( MEndo ` M ) |
| 2 |  | mendvscafval.v | |- .x. = ( .s ` M ) |
| 3 |  | mendvscafval.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 4 |  | mendvscafval.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` M ) |
| 5 |  | mendvscafval.k | |- K = ( Base ` S ) |
| 6 |  | mendvscafval.e | |- E = ( Base ` M ) |
| 7 |  | mendvsca.w | |- .xb = ( .s ` A ) |
| 8 |  | #P_sneq | |- ( x = X -> { x } = { X } ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_xpeq2d | |- ( x = X -> ( E X. { x } ) = ( E X. { X } ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_id | |- ( y = Y -> y = Y ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_oveqan12d | |- ( ( x = X /\ y = Y ) -> ( ( E X. { x } ) oF .x. y ) = ( ( E X. { X } ) oF .x. Y ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_mendvscafval | |- ( .s ` A ) = ( x e. K , y e. B |-> ( ( E X. { x } ) oF .x. y ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 12 | #P_eqtri | |- .xb = ( x e. K , y e. B |-> ( ( E X. { x } ) oF .x. y ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( ( E X. { X } ) oF .x. Y ) e. _V |
| 15 | 11, 13, 14 | #P_ovmpt2a | |- ( ( X e. K /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .xb Y ) = ( ( E X. { X } ) oF .x. Y ) ) |
